name: Baba Is You
summary: Baba Is You is a puzzle game where the rules you have to follow are present as physical objects in the game world. By manipulating the rules, you can change how the game works, repurpose things you find in the levels and cause surprising interactions!
info:
• 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PC
  • 开发: Hempuli
  • 游戏类型: Puzzle
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2019-03-14
  • 售价: 14.99 USD
  • 官方网站: http://www.hempuli.com/baba/
